en: Mummy and Daddy Pig have just made breakfast for Peppa and George.
zh: 猪妈妈和猪爸爸刚给佩奇和乔治做好早餐。

en: Breakfast is ready!
Peppa has red spots on her face!
zh: 佩奇脸上长满了红点点。

en: Mummy, I don't feel very well.
zh: 妈妈，我感觉有点不舒服。

en: Oh, dear, Peppa. You don't look very well.
zh: 哦，天啊，佩奇。你看上去很不好。

en: Don't worry. I'll ring Dr. Brown-Bear.
zh: 别担心。我打电话给棕熊医生。

en: Dr. Brown-Bear speaking.
Peppa is not very well.
Her face is covered in red spots!
Put Peppa to bed and I'll come straight round.
zh: 让佩奇在床上躺着，我一会儿就过来。

en: Dr. Brown Bear has come to make Peppa better.
zh: 棕熊医生过来给佩奇治病了。

en: Hello, Peppa, how are you today?
zh: 你好啊，佩奇，你今天感觉怎么样？

en: I am not very well.
Stick your tongue out, please.
Hmmm... It's not anything serious.
zh: 嗯。。。不是什么严重的问题

en: Peppa has just got a rash.
zh: 佩奇只是得了疹子而已。

en: Do I need medicine?!
The rash will clear up quickly.
But if you like, I can give you just a little medicine.
zh: 但是如果你想吃药，我可以开一点点药给你。

en: Yes, please.
I'm afraid it doesn't taste very nice.
zh: 恐怕它的味道不是很好。

en: Open wide, please.
Eeuuurgh! Disgusting!
You are a brave little one for taking it so well.
zh: 你一下子就吃完药了，真是个勇敢的小朋友。

en: Peppa must stay in bed.
I'll call back later to check that she is better.
zh: 我稍后会来看看她有没有好点。

en: Can Peppa have visitors?
Oh, yes, she can have visitors.
zh: 哦，当然可以，她可以有人来看望。

en: The rash isn't catching. Goodbye!
zh: 这疹子不会传染的。再见！

en: Goodbye! Dr. Brown Bear!
Mummy, can I get up now?
Dr. Brown Bear says that you must stay in bed for a little bit, Peppa.
zh: 棕熊医生说你必须卧室休息一会，佩奇。

en: But it's so boring!
Dr. Brown Bear did say you could have visitors.
zh: 棕熊医生说了你可以让人来探望你。

en: Can Suzy Sheep visit me?
Suzy Sheep is Peppa's best friend.
zh: 小羊苏西是佩奇最好的朋友。

en: I'll ring Suzy Sheep's mummy.
zh: 我来打电话给苏西的妈妈。

en: Hello, Mrs. Pig.
May Peppa talk with Suzy, please?
zh: 佩奇可以跟苏西通话吗？

en: Hello, Suzy!
Hello, Peppa.
I'm not very well.
I have red spots on my face.
Has the doctor been?
Yes, Dr. Brown Bear was here!
He said I was not very well and that I was very brave.
zh: 他说我不太好但我很勇敢。

en: So are you really ill?
Yes, yes! It's not pretend!
I have to stay in bed!
Dr. Brown Bear gave me medicine that tasted really horrible!
zh: 棕熊医生开了药给我，那药很难吃。

en: I'm coming to see you!
I'm going to wear my nurse's outfit!!!
Suzy Sheep has come to see Peppa.
Suzy is wearing her nurse's costume.
Danny Dog and Rebecca Rabbit have come along, too.
zh: 小狗丹尼和小兔瑞贝卡也来了。

en: Hello, Peppa!
Hello!
How do you feel?
I am not very well, Suzy.
I have to stay in bed.
What can we do to make you better?
zh: 我们能做点什么让你感觉好些？

en: You could get me some orange juice.
zh: 你们可以帮我倒些橙汁来

en: Ok!
Peppa seems to be quite enjoying herself.
zh: 佩奇看上去很享受生病。

en: Thank you, Suzy.
Do you feel any better?
A little bit. Danny,
Woof!
Ask my mummy if I could have some ice cream.
zh: 问问我妈妈我能不能吃些冰淇淋。

en: And Rebecca,could you bring me some flowers from the garden?
zh: 瑞贝卡，你可以帮我去花园采些花吗？

en: Dr. Brown Bear is here, to see if Peppa is better.
zh: 棕熊医生来了，来看看佩奇是否好点。

en: Ah, good, the nurse is already here!
zh: 啊，好，护士小姐已经来了！

en: How is the patient?
Err... I'm not a real nurse, it's just pretend.
zh: 呃。。。我不是真正的护士，我只是在扮演。

en: I see. Would you like me to take a look myseIf?
zh: 我明白了。那你介意我亲自去看看吗？

en: Yes, please.
I say! No more red spots!
You're completely better!
Aren't I still a bit ill?
How do you feel?
I think I should stay in bed a little bit more.
zh: 我觉得我应该在床上再多躺一会。

en: Hmm.. I fancy a game with this ball in the garden!!
zh: 嗯。我想要去花园里玩一会球！！

en: Who wants to join me?
Me! Me! Me!
Me, too!
Well, I never! A complete recovery!
zh: 好吧，我还从没看到过这么快就康复的！
